remarks: Define the Euler-Mascheroni constant, ` gamma = ` 0.577... .  This is the limit of the series ` sum_ k e. ( 1 ... m ) ( 1 / k ) - ( log `` m ) ` , with a proof that the limit exists in ~ emcl .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jul-2014.)
statement: df-em $p |- gamma = sum_ k e. NN ( ( 1 / k ) - ( log ` ( 1 + ( 1 / k ) ) ) ) $.
